title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller on Linux with build 20011127, the two tool items move below the label.
EB: These two tool items should stay on the same line as the label regardless of the size of the view. Users expect the close button to be on the same line as the label and located to the far right corner.
SR: To reproduce: on Linux, with build 20011127, open the Navigator view and resize it smaller. Observe the tool items moving below the label.
